summary:
To paraphrase Agent Mulder, I believe life is out there. Not up in the night sky, but out there in the wide world. Waiting. Kinetic. Beyond our office cubicles, beyond our borders, beyond our comfort zones. As a strategist, there’s no greater privilege than the opportunity to occupy different lives and interrogate different cultural and commercial contexts. I have an incurable case of creative wanderlust and I don’t ever want to stop learning. It’s no wonder my career has taken me around the globe.

I’ve been fortunate enough to lead four very different agencies in three countries and two languages, and currently get my globetrotting kicks as part of the leadership team of 72andSunny Amsterdam.

Along the way, I've helped Wieden+Kennedy London rebuild a modern strategy department, helped W+K Global give the network's creativity more commercial edge, restored 180 Amsterdam’s creative mojo and global roster, and turned a traditional WPP shop in Spain into a Cannes-winning, start-up springboard. Before that, I worked at London’s Digital Agency of the Decade and the most effective agency in the world. 

At every step, my ambition has been simple: make work I love with people I love. I couldn't be in a better place.

Nothing enforces simplicity like a second language. I was lucky to be there at a golden moment when the agency was the best in the world, a place filled with more nationalities than Eurovision, and where ambition, informality and daily culture shocks kept your eyes and smile wide. I made friends for life and learnt I knew nothing.', 'title': 'Global Planning Director', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 8568, 'name': 'Dare', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHNkB4JUgGyWQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1625127406399?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=WK2kOIAdtx1w_wv1qxAb1OcLORs12sICWgLSBTG-PoE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/dare/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'London, United Kingdom', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'company': 'Dare', 'description': "Before moving to Amsterdam, I began my career in London, where I worked for Miles Calcraft Briginshaw Duffy (later Dare), an agency that was recognised repeatedly as the Effectiveness Agency of the Year and crowned Digital Agency of the Decade. I was also recognised by the UK’s Campaign magazine as a ‘Face to Watch.’ I've done my best to prove them right. Since then, I've gone on to win over 80 creative and effectiveness awards - from IPA and Effie Golds and Grand Prix to Cannes Lions and D&AD Pencils.", 'title': 'Senior Planner', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 2819, 'name': 'Publicis, London', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQGTea2EP5__ww/company-logo_400_400/0/1519855873028?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=AccE__KM7UUA5_WAtHz3CnDLjB9ZNHAwSLFb9keAORg', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/publicis/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2003}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2003}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}}, 'company': 'Publicis', 'description': 'After a few years of work experience in agencies, digital start-ups and production studios, I was blooded at Publicis.
